***
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Redesign of the Main Entrance
| **Reference** | **Information** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | CB-6965-11724107 |
| **Tender Number** | 23-58055 |
| **Publication Date** | July 5, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | August 17, 2023, 2:00 PM EST |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | August 24, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | December 22, 2023 |

**Project Overview**
The National Research Council (NRC) Canada has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the redesign of the main entrance at 75 de Mortagne Blvd, Boucherville, QC. The proposed project includes remodeling the main entrance, adding an electrical conduit, and installing a pedestrian walkway.

**Tender Requirements**
Only email submissions will be accepted. Submissions must be sent to NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca, with the subject line clearly indicating the project title. The contractor's representative must attend a mandatory site visit at 9:00 AM on July 18th or 19th, 2023, at the designated site. A signed attendance form must be obtained by the contractor's representative.

**Security Requirements**
All personnel working on the project must undergo a security screening to obtain a RELIABILITY status level as defined in the Canadian Government's security policy.

**Additional Requirements**
* All bidders must possess a valid Workers' Safety and Insurance Board (CSST) certificate.
* A valid Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and/or a World Trade Organization (WTO) Declaration of Origin may be required for international bidders.

**Contact Information**
* Contracting Authority: Collin Long, Collin.Long@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Departmental Representative: Jean-Philippe Jacob, Jean-Philippe.Jacob@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-549-1549
* Fax: Not Applicable
